channel.title: Bert Proesmans - Enunciation
channel.description: Presence on the internet is a must?

item.title: Proesmans? What's that
item.author: Unknown
item.description: The world is actually well connected, at least if you’re using the internet. My virtual personna through which I experience internet adventures has my real name attached. It’s the same name that sometimes causes funny pronounciations and confusion.
